name: Lone Hero
description:
Classic game, simple operation, shocking scenes! You will be a person to defend his position!
The enemy will continue to capture your position, you hit the enemy to get the gold to buy guns, or even buy a nuclear bomb! To the turret, heavy machine gun upgrade, the higher the level, the greater the power of the turret and heavy machine guns.
You have to be very good to configure their weapons, or the enemy will easily take your position!
The game is very exciting, how many times can you hold the enemy attack? We will wait and see!
